00028 abstract class VMStorage {
00029 
00031         protected $lstFolders = array();
00032 
00036         public function __construct() {
00037                 
00038         }
00039 
00043         public function __destruct() {
00044                 
00045         }
00046 
00051         public function renameAll($folder) {
00052                 foreach( $lstFolders[$folder] as $vm ) {
00053                         $this->rename($vm);
00054                 }
00055         }
00056 
00060         abstract public function load();
00061         
00069         abstract public function rename($foldName, $oldName, $newName);
00070 
00076         abstract public function deleteFolder($folder); 
00077         
00084         abstract public function delete($folder, $vm);
